name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-covid-indicator
title: COVID-19 Indicator
shortDescription: This Adaptive Card Extension displays COVID-19 data from the specified country.
longDescription: This Adaptive Card Extension allows the user to select a country and display real-time COVID-19 related data in the card. In the QuickView it displays additional data such as total population, severity of cases, and deaths.

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.
